title: Did Richard Branson Say Trump Spent a 2-Hour Lunch Speaking of Revenge?
subtitle: The Virgin Group founder wrote that Donald Trump vowed to "spend the rest of his life destroying five people" who had declined to help him.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Virgin Group founder Richard Branson said that years ago Donald Trump spent the entirety of a two-hour lunch vowing to "spend the rest of his life destroying five people" who had declined to help him.
